languages.text: "Если бы только Великий дал знак, что его прекрасный боевой ангел выжил и освещает эти ублюдские захолустья!" {n}Джай восхищенно взирает на Ардженту и складывает аквилу.{/n} "Я бы давно примчалась к тебе, о сестра. Союзника надежнее в этом дерьмовом местечке сыскать невозможно".

"If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."
languages.original_text: "Если бы только Великий дал знак, что его прекрасный боевой ангел выжил и освещает эти ублюдские захолустья!" {n}Джай восхищенно взирает на Ардженту и складывает аквилу.{/n} "Я бы давно примчалась к тебе, о сестра. Союзника надежнее в этом дерьмовом местечке сыскать невозможно".

You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「この不快な場所を光で照らすため、彼の美しい戦天使は生き残るという兆しを、エグザルテッド・ワンがアタシに与えてくださればよかったのに！」{n}ジェイは感嘆のまなざしをアルジェンタに向けてアクィラの印を作る。{/n}「早くアンタのそばに駆けてけば良かった、シスター。このクソだめじゃ、アタシらより信頼できる仲間なんて見つからないよ」
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: 「この不快な場所を光で照らすため、彼の美しい戦天使は生き残るという兆しを、エグザルテッド・ワンがアタシに与えてくださればよかったのに！」{n}ジェイは感嘆のまなざしをアルジェンタに向けてアクィラの印を作る。{/n}「早くアンタのそばに駆けてけば良かった、シスター。このクソだめじゃ、アタシらより信頼できる仲間なんて見つからないよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “可惜至高无上的神皇没有予我启示，告诉我美丽的战斗天使还活着，圣光仍在照亮这恶心的地方！”{n}婕伊感激地望着阿洁塔，比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“若早知如此，我一定会早早地赶到你身边，修女。在这个粪坑里，你绝对找不到比我更值得信赖的盟友了。”
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: “可惜至高无上的神皇没有予我启示，告诉我美丽的战斗天使还活着，圣光仍在照亮这恶心的地方！”{n}婕伊感激地望着阿洁塔，比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“若早知如此，我一定会早早地赶到你身边，修女。在这个粪坑里，你绝对找不到比我更值得信赖的盟友了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si seulement l'Exalté m'avait envoyé un signe indiquant que son ange de bataille avait survécu pour illuminer cet endroit répugnant de sa beauté ! {n}Jae lance un regard admiratif à Argenta en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} Je me serais précipitée pour vous rejoindre, ma sœur. Vous ne trouverez pas d'alliée plus fiable que moi dans ce trou à rats. »
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: « Si seulement l'Exalté m'avait envoyé un signe indiquant que son ange de bataille avait survécu pour illuminer cet endroit répugnant de sa beauté ! {n}Jae lance un regard admiratif à Argenta en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} Je me serais précipitée pour vous rejoindre, ma sœur. Vous ne trouverez pas d'alliée plus fiable que moi dans ce trou à rats. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ojalá el Exaltado me hubiera enviado una señal de que su preciosa ángel guerrera había sobrevivido para iluminar este sitio inmundo!». {n}Jae mira con admiración a Argenta y hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «Habría acudido a tu lado hace mucho, Hermana. No encontrará a una aliada más leal en este estercolero».
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ojalá el Exaltado me hubiera enviado una señal de que su preciosa ángel guerrera había sobrevivido para iluminar este sitio inmundo!». {n}Jae mira con admiración a Argenta y hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «Habría acudido a tu lado hace mucho, Hermana. No encontrará a una aliada más leal en este estercolero».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hätte mir der Erhabene doch nur ein Zeichen geben, dass dieser wunderschöne Engel der Schlacht überlebt hat, um diesen abstoßenden Ort zu erhellen!" {n}Jae blickt voller Bewunderung zu Argenta und macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Dann wäre ich schon vor langer Zeit an Eure Seite geeilt, Schwester. Eine vertrauenswürdigere Verbündete werdet Ihr in diesem Drecksloch nicht finden."
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte mir der Erhabene doch nur ein Zeichen geben, dass dieser wunderschöne Engel der Schlacht überlebt hat, um diesen abstoßenden Ort zu erhellen!" {n}Jae blickt voller Bewunderung zu Argenta und macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Dann wäre ich schon vor langer Zeit an Eure Seite geeilt, Schwester. Eine vertrauenswürdigere Verbündete werdet Ihr in diesem Drecksloch nicht finden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Keşke Görkemli bana bir işaret gönderseydi de güzel harp meleğinin sağ kaldığını, bu iğrenç yeri aydınlatacağını bilseydim!" {n}Jae, Argenta'ya hayran hayran bakıp Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Bilseydim çoktan yanına gelmiştim Rahibe. Bu bok çukurunda benden daha güvenilir bir müttefik bulamazsın."
languages.original_text: "If only the Exalted One had given me a sign that his beautiful battle angel had survived to illuminate this disgusting place!" {n}Jae gazes admiringly at Argenta and makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "I would have rushed to your side long ago, Sister. You'll not find a more trustworthy ally in this shithole."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke Görkemli bana bir işaret gönderseydi de güzel harp meleğinin bu iğrenç ortamı aydınlatmak için sağ kaldığını bilseydim!" {n}Jae, Argenta'ya hayran hayran bakıp Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Bilseydim çoktan yanına gelmiştim Rahibe. Bu bok çukurunda benden daha güvenilir bir müttefik bulamazsın."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
